title: How to Roast Flaxseeds

steps.headline: Put the flaxseeds in a hot, dry skillet on medium heat.
Stir them frequently for 5 to 7 minutes so that they roast and don’t burn or scorch.
Place seeds in an even layer in a roasting pan.
Roast the seeds in a preheated 375F (190 °C) oven for 5 to 10 minutes.

text: Roasting Flaxseeds in a Skillet Put the flaxseeds in a hot, dry skillet on medium heat.  Stir them frequently for 5 to 7 minutes so that they roast and don’t burn or scorch.  Roasting Flaxseeds in the Oven Place seeds in an even layer in a roasting pan.  Roast the seeds in a preheated 375F (190 °C) oven for 5 to 10 minutes.  Finished.
